question: Who has been made the brand ambassador of the upcoming T20 Mumbai League?
explanation: Sachin Tendulkar has been made the brand ambassador of the upcoming T20 Mumbai League. The league will be organised by Sports India Pvt Ltd, a consortium of IIFL Group as Lead Member and Wizcraft, with the approval and sanction of the Mumbai Cricket Association. 6 teams from Mumbai North, North-West, North-East, North- Central, South-Central and South will participate in the League.
